full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM TSIG RDO RJES GSUNG BA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR PHYAG LEN GYI ZIN BRIS 'GA' ZHIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO DANG, MKHAS BTZUN DAM PA BYAMS PA BSAM GTAN GYI THUGS MKHYEN RAB KYI ROL MTSO LAS BYUNG BA'I YID BZHIN NOR BU STE, ,DE GNYIS KYI DRUNG NAS BDAG DAM TSIG RDO RJES 'KHRUL 'KHOR GYI PHYAG 'KHRID ZHUS SKABS MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAM GNYIS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BA CHEN POS GNANG BA LAGS SO, ,)
